pkgmetadata.longdescription: datastorage-----------To use simply do:: >>> from datastorage import DataStorage >>> data = DataStorage( a=(1,2,3),b="add",filename='store.npz' ) >>> # data.a will be a dictionary >>> data = DataStorage( myinfo = dict( name= 'marco', surname= 'cammarata'),\ >>> data = np.arange(100) ) >>> # reads from file if it exists >>> data = DataStorage( 'mysaveddata.npz' ) ; >>> create empty storage (with default filename) >>> data = DataStorage() >>> data.mynewdata = np.ones(10)
